question: Hey, have you heard of the new dance? It's called the Brush 'n Sweep!
Isn't that just a fancy name for the shuffle? You know, brush forward and brush back?
My tap shoes are so dusty, I need to clean them.
Why not just shuffle around the room? That'll brush off the dust!
If I were a dance move, I'd be the Double Brusharoo!
Sounds like you're describing the shuffle, with a brush forward and a brush back!
I'm playing a game of tap-dance soccer, want to join?
Tap-dance soccer? So we ball change instead of passing?
I bought new golf balls, but I realized I prefer the old ones.
So, you performed a 'ball change' in golf, just like in tap dance!
I can't decide if I want to tap with the heel or the ball of my foot.
Why not both? Do a 'ball change' - tap with the ball of your foot and then change to the heel.
I'm creating a new dance called 'The Ladder'.
Are there any 'tap steps' in it?
I've been practicing my Morse code with my feet.
Oh, so you're tapping out messages? Sounds like a 'tap step'!
My pet parrot learned a new trick. It mimics my tap dancing.
So, it's got the 'tap step' down?
Why are the ducks in this pond so loud?
Maybe they're practicing their 'flap' for the local duck tap dance competition!
I thought I heard someone tapping on my window last night.
Are you sure it wasn't just a tree branch doing a 'flap' dance in the wind?
Do you know any good pancake recipes?
Sure, but only if you can do a 'flap' jack dance!
I heard there was a scuffle in the garden.
Yes, the worms were having a tap dance competition!
Why are your shoes so dirty?
Oh, I was just practicing my 'scuffle' steps in the muddy yard!
What's that noise coming from your room?
Sorry, that's just me 'scuffling' to the beat of my favorite song!
Why is your alarm clock making such a weird rhythm?
Oh, that? I've just set it to 'time steps'. Makes waking up a lot more fun!
I noticed you're always tapping your feet during math class.
Yeah, I'm just trying to understand the concept of 'time steps'. It's a tap dance thing!
Why do you keep tapping your foot every time I mention time?
Just practicing my 'time steps', it's all about rhythm and timing, you know.
What's that noise coming from your shoes?
Oh, I'm practicing my 'cramproll'. It's kind of like a dance drum roll!
I thought you said we were having bread rolls for lunch?
No, I said 'cramproll'. It's a tap dance move, silly!
Why are you stomping around like that?
I'm not stomping, I'm doing a 'cramproll'. Tap dancing is harder than it looks!
Did you say you were growing wings? Are you turning into a bird?
No, silly! 'Wings' is a tap dance move where you brush your feet outwards.
Why are you flapping around like that?
I'm not flapping, I'm practicing my 'wings'! It's a cool tap dance step!
Are you trying to fly away or something?
No, just working on my 'wings'. Tap dancing makes me feel like I can fly though!
You look like you're trying to walk backwards on the moon!
Nah, just practicing my pullbacks. They're a neat tap dance move.
Are you okay? You seem to be sliding backwards!
Haha, no worries! I'm just practicing my pullbacks for tap class.
Why are you sliding your feet back like that? You look like a reverse sprinter!
I'm not sprinting, I'm tap dancing! This move is called a pullback.
Why are you making car noises and tap dancing at the same time?
I'm not imitating a car, silly. I'm practicing a tap dance step called the Maxi Ford!
Are you trying to stomp out an imaginary fire or something?
Nope! I'm just practicing the Maxi Ford. It's a classic tap dance move.
Why are you tap dancing like a horse galloping?
Haha, I'm actually doing the Maxi Ford, it's a cool tap dance step.
Are you trying to mimic Morse code with your feet?
Haha, not really! I'm just practicing the Paradiddle, a tap dance rhythm!
Why does your tap dance sound like a drum solo?
Well, I'm practicing a tap dance step called the Paradiddle. It's got a rhythmic pattern that drummers often use too!
Why do you keep repeating the same pattern with your feet?
Because that's what the Paradiddle is! It's a repeated rhythmic pattern in tap dance.
Hey, why are you gliding across the room like a penguin?
I'm not being a penguin! I'm practicing tap dance Slides!
You look like you're trying to ice skate on a hardwood floor!
Haha, close! It's called Slides in tap dance, gives a similar smooth gliding motion!
Did you just lose your balance, or was that a dance move?
Oh, that? That was a tap dance move called a Slide. Gives a whole new meaning to 'slip and slide', doesn't it?
Why are you stepping over imaginary obstacles?
I'm not avoiding obstacles! I'm practicing the 'Over the Top' tap dance move!
Did you just perform a high step or are you trying to step over a puddle?
Neither, I was practicing my 'Over the Top' tap dance move!
Are you training for hurdles in track and field?
Haha, no, it's a tap dance move. It's called 'Over the Top'.
Are you practicing for a royal ball? You're dancing in 3/4 time!
Nope, not a royal ball, but you're right about the 3/4 time. I'm doing the Waltz Clog!
Why do your tap shoes sound like they're dancing to a waltz?
Good ear! That's because I'm practicing a tap dance called the Waltz Clog!
Are you combining tap dancing with a waltz?
Exactly! It's a move called the Waltz Clog in tap dancing!
Hey, are you trying to tap dance your way to Cincinnati?
Not exactly, but I am doing a tap dance step called the Cincinnati!
You're tap dancing like you're trying to spell something with your feet.
Haha, close! I'm practicing a tap dance move called the Cincinnati!
Are you doing a Morse code message with your tap shoes?
Nope, I'm just practicing the Cincinnati, a fun tap dance step!
